ValidationRule.description: In case of select clause, all fields except fieldvalue and/or parameter should be empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(clcommon__Filter_Type__c, 'SELECT_FIELD'), OR( NOT(ISBLANK( clcommon__Expression_Left__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( clcommon__Expression_Right__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(clcommon__Operator__c))), AND( ISBLANK(clcommon__Field_Name__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(clcommon__Operator__c)), ISBLANK(clcommon__Value__c) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For SELECT FIELD filter, Field Name, Alias must be filled. Aggregation can be selected too. Other fields must be empty
